newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish shares close lower in continuous trade.
newsitem.headline: Polish shares close lower in continuous trade.

text.p: Eight stocks fell, two rose and six were flat in eight-million-zloty Warsaw bourse continuous trade on Monday with the WIG 20 index down 1.6 percent to 1,502.4 points.
The remaining seven stocks did not trade.
Gorazdze trade was suspended due to uncertainty on the firm's condition after the recent flooding in Poland.
NFI units fell 1.2 percent to 127 zlotys in a 4.9-million-zloty turnover.
Five National Investment Funds (NFIs) fell, four rose and two were flat in one-million-zloty trade. Four did not trade.
